messages.title: Turn Manchester Green
messages.content: We aim to create a just and sustainable society, a society that gives everyone their fair share.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Serious action to stop climate change by drastically reducing carbon emissions, an end to all UK fracking operations.

An end to austerity, a reformed welfare system, a doubled Child Benefit and better pensions, a Living Wage of £10 per hour by 2020, a wealth tax on the richest 1%, a clamp down on tax avoidance, a reduction in risky trading and billions saved by scrapping Trident.
500,000 high quality social homes, The Bedroom Tax scrapped, Investment in home insulation to lower energy bills for the poorest 9 million homes.
Renationalised railways, saving £1.2 billion, improving services and reducing fares, Rather than HS2, support for a nationwide high-speed rail network that serves the whole nation, not just London.

Free undergraduate university education and restoration of Education Maintenance Allowance for 16-17 year olds, a comprehensive nationwide system of good quality pre-school early education and childcare, free at the point of delivery.
An end to the privatisation of our NHS
